name: Emissary of Flourishing
flavor: After the battles have subsided he arrives to repair the damage.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, reveal two cards from the top of your deck, and you may put an elf from among them into your resource zone. Then, put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck.

name: Escutcheon Angel
flavor: Her shields are controlled by magic, and she can send them to protect her allies fighting on the lands below.
ability:
[CONT] When your creature takes damage from a spell, reduce that damage by 1.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Any) When your creature takes damage, reduce that damage by 1. This ability cannot reduce the damage to 1 or less.

name: Darkbane Priest
flavor: "Begone, in the name of the Holy Lord!"
ability: [AUTO] When this fort is attacked, you may Siphon X. If you do, the attacking creature gets -X/+0 for this turn. This ability can only activate once per turn. (To Siphon X, reduce the value of one of your dice by X.)

name: Sanctuary Squire
flavor: Even if her life is forfeit, she will not retreat.

name: Answered Prayers
flavor: No plea for help will go unanswered.
ability:
Ambush [C@2] (You may pay C@2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked and this card is an ambush, you may stand all your creatures at this fort, and remove all damage from those creatures.

name: Incapacitate
ability:
Choose an opposing creature, and it cannot attack or block for this turn.
[Fort Burst] Play this card without paying its cost.

name: Shield of Logres
flavor: The sight of their nation's sigil is enough to rally the soldiers of Logres.

name: Ghis, Unending Fury
flavor: A strange mutation caused it to grow vicious horns on its back that protects it from surprise attacks.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is summoned, choose one of your forts with two or more barriers and an opposing fort with two or more barriers, and deal 1 damage to them.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Green) When this creature attacks, choose an opposing fort, and put all creatures with cost less than or equal to the value of this creature's DC@ +2 from that fort into your opponent's resource zone.

name: Threa, Blessed by Fairies
flavor: The light of the fairies empowers her allies and scatters her enemies.
ability:
[CONT] If you have another elf, this creature gets +1/+1.
[CONT] [Dragocross](Green) All of your other elves get +1/+1.

name: Fearful Sprite
flavor: Taking shelter from the fighting, she anxiously waits for the war to end.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature blocks, reveal the top card of your deck, and if you revealed an elf, you may put it into your hand. If you did not add a card to your hand, put the revealed card on the bottom of your deck.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Any) When this creature blocks, this creature gets +0/+1 until the end of the battle, and at the end of the battle, [STAND] this creature.

name: Favored Scholar
flavor: It is the job of a teacher to impart wisdom and wonder into his students.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, reveal two cards from the top of your deck, and you may summon a cost 2 or less elf from among them. If you did not summon a creature, put the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck.

name: Nimble Outrider
flavor: In her domain, none can challenge her supremacy.
ability: [CONT] This creature cannot be chosen by opposing spells or abilities.

name: Chromegear Paladin
flavor: With his newfound strength, he hoists a brand new weapon into the field.

name: Dauntless Lancer
flavor: She will not retreat, not even when the odds are against her.

name: Untested Scout
flavor: He may be young, but his determination is that of a seasoned fighter's.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, reveal two cards from the top of your deck, and if you revealed an elf, choose one of your elves, and it gets +2/+2 for this turn. Then, put the revealed cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Erudite Archer
flavor: Young though he may be for an elf, he is already an accomplished marksman and scout.
ability: [CONT] If you have another elf, this creature gets +1/+1.

name: Cleanse
flavor: They will no longer tolerate the defiling of their lands.
ability: Choose an ambush, and destroy it.

name: Runemark of Tir na Nog
flavor: The runemark of Tir na Nog is a symbol of peace and goodwill throughout the land.
